alert.note: Alert for Eastern Chichagof Island; Glacier Bay; Haines Borough and Lynn Canal; Juneau Borough and Northern Admiralty Island; Taiya Inlet and Klondike Highway (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 18 at 9:31AM AKST until January 20 at 3:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY MORNING THROUGH LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches possible. * WHERE...Taiya Inlet and Klondike Highway, Haines Borough and Lynn Canal, Glacier Bay, Eastern Chichagof Island and Juneau Borough and Northern Admiralty Island. * WHEN...From Wednesday morning through late Wednesday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Areas along the Icy Strait Corridor will likely see a changeover to rain through Wednesday afternoon. Areas further north could see the changeover to rain delayed until Wednesday evening or Wednesday night, especially along the Haines and Klondike Highway.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
